articles.author: Erin Fe
articles.title: Santa Barbara County could be moving into the orange Covid tier within weeks - KSBY San Luis Obispo News
articles.description: To get into the orange tier requires around two to five COVID-19 cases per 100,000 people in the county, or four million vaccinations given in the state of California.
articles.content:
This week, Santa Barbara County Public Health leaders announced Santa Barbara County may be moving into the orange tier within weeks. The county just turned the corner in the red tier last week.
